name: The Memoirs of Ghostman Pat
description:
The game has you take control of the postman of a dead letter office. Delivering letters to souls who are stuck on their way to the afterlife, still holding on, unable to ascend. Read each letter and make sure you help each spirit get the letter that's addressed to them, while you reflect on your place in the world.

----------------------------------------------------

Controls -

A/D - Move left and right 

SPACE - Talk/Interact

 R - Read the letter

 E - Give letter

"you must talk to all the passengers before letters can arrive"
